author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 17-year-old boy was fatally knocked down by a private college bus here a Chozhankottai on Thursday. The victim Manikandan, a Plus Two student, had stepped out of his home to buy stationary items.

According to the police, the incident occurred when he was crossing the road, when a speeding college bus knocked him down. A case has been registered in this connection.
title: Student killed in accident
